video.title: A Man Called God
video.synopsis: Raised in America, government agent Choi Kang-Ta returns to Korea with the skills of an assassin and a thirst for revenge on his father’s killers.

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta knows that Chairman Kang came to Hawaii to smuggle weapons. To avenge his parents' death, he and his team work on their plans one by one.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta targets Jang Yong. Vivian asks Kang-ta if they need to get rid of Bo-bae. But he only says she should focus on the party Jang will attend.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Secretary Pyo tries to take Bo-bae away, but Kang-ta shows up and defeats dagger-wielding kidnappers easily. Kang-ta and Woo-hyun begin horse-racing.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A biker puts a CD in Jang Yong's car. The CD plays Kang-ta's disguised voice, which mentions Hae-ryong, and says the car will blow up in 2 minutes.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Vivian sneaks into Jang Yong's house to open a safe containing a secret document. But she fails, and so do the experts hired by Woo-hyun.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta saves people in danger! Vivian is bothered that Kang-ta pays too much attention to Bo-bae, and Deok-bo hands over a USB to Kang-ta.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta tells Hyeong-seob who his father is, and says Jang-ho should face legal justice. He adds that he'll reveal the truth if he lets Jang-ho out.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Woo-hyun seals the building where Kang-ta is, but Kang-ta easily walks away. Woo-hyun confirms that Kang-ta is the Peter Pan he has been looking for.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The fact that Bo-bae is linked to Hyeong-seob's death worries Jang Yong, because Woo-hyun likes her, which makes it hard to get rid of her.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that Deok-bo knows Peter Pan's face, Woo-hyun interrogates him. He learns that Jang-ho's watch has a tracking device. He goes to see Vivian.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After finding out that Kang-ta went to Dal-soo, Woo-hyun moves all his men to his house. Kang-ta tells Dal-soo to reveal who killed his father.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Vivian tells Kang-ta that they have one more enemy to kill and that Jang Yong has another daughter, which is Bo-bae. Kang-ta says he won't touch her.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The news that Kang-ta got shot and fell into a river makes Jang Yong happy. Woo-hyun tries to find his body, and tells Bo-bae who Peter Pan is.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting Kang-ta may be alive, Woo-hyun follows Bo-bae. Vivian says she and Woo-hyun will be killed if he is alive. Her lie shocks Bo-bae.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: After confirming Kang-ta is alive, Woo-hyun starts tracking him down. But he falls into Kang-ta's trap and ends up getting arrested by the police.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta goes to Tae-jin, whom Woo-hyun starts tracking down. Woo-hyun brings back Mi-soo's glass from her place, to compare her DNA with Kang-ta's.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: In his attempt to kill Peter Pan, Woo-hyun is taken hostage by Peter Pan, which leads to the suspicion that they work together. Shock awaits Kang-ta.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Mi-soo wrongly believes that Peter Pan killed Tae-jin. Woo-hyun asks a favor, and she says she will do everything to avenge her father's death.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Woo-hyun captures and tortures Kang-ta. Vivian gets wind of this and asks for his location. Jonny gets a message from someone and comes to his rescue.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Mi-soo cannot accept the truth even after seeing her and Kang-ta's DNA results. Kang-ta claims to be innocent and tries to get her memory back.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta says Mi-soo needs to know how their parents died. But she says that the responsible party should be punished within the limits of the law.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Bo-bae tells Kang-ta that he should stop this cycle of death. He seems determined, so she reiterates killing is not tolerated, which bothers him.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The moment Kang-ta finds himself in danger, Mi-soo shows up with the police. But Woo-hyun is still hot on his trail, and has killers kidnap Mi-soo.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Kang-ta plays a recording where a deal is to be made. After handing over info to him through Bo-bae, Jang-mi takes pills and falls into a coma.
episodes.title: Episode 24
